text:
I brewed some coffee but would you like anything, 
Fuyuko?

Could I trouble you for some hot chocolate?
Thanks.

......Oh right, I bought some sweets,
do you want to have some as well?

Eh...
Is it alright for me to have some?

Even if you're going to refrain, you should think about how 
you say it. It sounds like I never share anything with you.
